<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_map_core_location_sync</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Disable multiple uncomplete sync</name> <order>-1000</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var syncRecordGr = new GlideRecord('sn_map_core_location_sync'); syncRecordGr.addQuery('cmn_location_campus', current.getValue('cmn_location_campus')); syncRecordGr.addQuery('state', '!=', 'complete'); syncRecordGr.addQuery('state', '!=', 'aborted'); syncRecordGr.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on'); syncRecordGr.setLimit(1); syncRecordGr.query();
if (syncRecordGr.getRowCount() > 0) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('A synchronization for this CMN Location campus is already started. Please complete it before to create a new one')); current.setWorkflow(false); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-30 08:16:06</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1b2574fe538f2510a634ddeeff7b1203</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable multiple uncomplete sync</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1b2574fe538f2510a634ddeeff7b1203</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-30 14:35:54</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1b2574fe538f2510a634ddeeff7b1203"/> </record_update>
